title: Pearson (Smarthinking)
text: With [Smarthinking], students can chat with a live tutor up to 24 hours a day from any internet connection. Tutors are available to work with you in a wide range of subjects including writing , math , accounting, statistics, finance, economics, biology, anatomy & physiology, physics, chemistry, office applications, and Spanish. You can also submit a paper for personalized feedback within 24 hours.
